title: Connect4 AI Project
description: This is a project to allow you to play Connect4 against another person or bot. It utilizes the negamax algorithm and a static game board evaluation method.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This is a project that helped me learn React, JS, HTML, and CSS. I also wanted to have a place that I could share some of the projects I have worked on and this was the perfect space.

title: Family Recipes Project
description: This is a project I worked on with several teammates. I mainly worked on the backend in Python and Flask. We finished the backend but not the frontend by the end of the semester.
